005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.EmailAddressItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016/**
017 * An atomic Metapath item containing an email address data value.
018 */
019public interface IEmailAddressItem extends IStringItem {
020  /**
021   * Get the type information for this item.
022   *
023   * @return the type information
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IEmailAddressItem> type() {
027    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.EMAIL_ADDRESS.getItemType();
028  }
029
030  @Override
031  default IAtomicOrUnionType<IEmailAddressItem> getType() {
032    return type();
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * /** Construct a new email address item using the provided string
037   * {@code value}.
038   *
039   * @param value
040   *          a string representing an email address value
041   * @return the new item
042   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
043   *           if the given string is not an email address value
044   */
045  @NonNull
046  static IEmailAddressItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
047    try {
048      return new EmailAddressItemImpl(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.EMAIL_ADDRESS.parse(value));
049    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
050      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
051          null,
052          String.format("Invalid email address value '%s'. %s",
053              value,
054              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
055          ex);
056    }
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
061   *
062   * @param item
063   *          the item to cast
064   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
065   *         cast to this type
066   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
067   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
068   */
069  @NonNull
070  static IEmailAddressItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
071    try {
072      return item instanceof IEmailAddressItem
073          ? (IEmailAddressItem) item
074          : valueOf(item.asString());
075    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
076      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
077      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
078    }
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  default IEmailAddressItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
083    return cast(item);
084  }
085}
